Description: back pay award in unfair labor practices case
NAICS Translation: 541990: All Other Professional, Scientific, and Technical Services

Company: US Ecology Texas and TD*X Associates
Description: The Environmental Protection Agency announced it reached a settlement with US Ecology Texas and TD*X Associates in Robstown, Texas, for violating federal hazardous waste laws. The settlement, a legal document called a Consent Agreement and Final Order (CAFO), resolved three counts against US Ecology of Texas and TD*X Associates for processing hazardous waste without a permit or interim status and one count against US Ecology Texas for storing hazardous waste without a permit or interim status at its facility on County Road 69 in Robstown.
Info Source: https://archive.epa.gov/epapages/newsroom_archive/newsreleases/75ca37df094c547c85257a8d006ea6b8.html
N-waste firm admits improper storage; Ordered to pay $10,000 fine, Knoxville News-Sentinel, August 9, 2002 (via Nexis).
